name: Banjo-Kongzooie
description: The first DK64 Romhack to use custom textured maps, among other new technical innovations. Explore the lair and first two levels of Banjo-Kazooie with the DK Crew, and collect some things along the way.
short_description: Explore the lair and first two levels of Banjo-Kazooie with the DK Crew, and collect some things along the way.
